items.question: Where is your company located?
items.answer: Our office is located at 1135 Walsh Ave, Santa Clara, California.

items.question: Where do you ship from?
items.answer: We ship from our partnered warehouses across the State. Please expect your items to be shipped separately (if you ordermore than one item)as different warehouses specialize in different areas of manufacturing.

items.question: How long will it take for my items to arrive?
items.answer: Ships from the shop within 2 business days. Transit time for standard shipping is 3-4 business days. Estimated arrival time iswithin 8 business days of the customer's order.

items.question: How long will it take for my items to arrive?

intro.p1: At Pets Clan, we are committed to bringing a smarter, greener, and more convenient pet lifestyle to every pet owner. We firmly believe that Technology and Design should be centered on user needs to create products that can truly improve the quality of life.
intro.p2: We are not only a promoter of technology, but also a bridge between pets and pet owners, helping you to establish a deeper emotional connection with your pet.

Green living, energy conservation
and environmental protection

pets and the planet

feeding at any time

and feed them anytime

with environmental protection

a choice of quality

integration of technology and aesthetics

warranty_policy_page.title: WARRANTY POLICY
warranty_policy_page.p1: Pets Clan provides a one (1) year limited warranty on all products purchased through the official Pets Clan website. This limited warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship that occur under normal use for a period of one (1) year from the date of delivery. If a Pets Clan product fails due to a defect in materials or workmanship within this one-year warranty period, we will repair or replace it for the customer free of charge. This limited warranty does not cover damage caused by misuse, abuse, normal wear and tear, unauthorized repairs or modifications to the product, or any incidental or consequential damages.
warranty_policy_page.discount_heading: For customers within two (2) months past the warranty period, we will offer a discount on the purchase of a new product.
warranty_policy_page.p2: To make a warranty claim, customers should contact the Pets Clan customer service team at support@petsclan.com and provide proof of purchase and a description of the issue.
warranty_policy_page.p3: As a condition of this warranty, both parties agree that the remedies provided in this warranty policy are the customer's sole and exclusive remedies and that Pets Clan's sole liability under this warranty. All incidental damages are hereby disclaimed. The purchaser agrees to retain the original proof of purchase to determine the effective date of this warranty. If Pets Clan or an authorized dealer replaces a product during the warranty period, this replacement shall be considered a transaction under the original warranty and will not extend the original warranty period. This warranty is non-transferable. Pets Clan is committed to providing customers with high-quality products and excellent customer service.
warranty_policy_page.disclaimer: Except for the warranties set forth in this warranty policy, Pets Clan makes no warranty whatsoever with respect to the products, including any (A) warranty of merchantability; or (B) warranty of fitness for a particular purpose; whether express or implied by law, course of dealing, course of performance, usage of trade or otherwise.

terms_of_service_page.title: TERMS OF SERVICE
terms_of_service_page.intro_1: These Terms of Service (the “Terms”) set forth the legally binding terms and conditions that govern your use of the Site. By accessing or using the Site, you are accepting these Terms (on behalf of yourself or the entity that you represent), and you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority, and capacity to enter into these Terms (on behalf of yourself or the entity that you represent). You may not access or use the Site or accept the Terms if you are not at least 18 years old. If you do not agree with all of the provisions of these Terms, do not access and/or use the Site.
terms_of_service_page.intro_2:
Please be aware that Section 13.2 of these Terms, below, contains provisions governing how disputes that you and we have against each other are resolved, including, without limitation, any disputes that arose or were asserted prior to the effective date of these Terms. In particular, it contains an arbitration agreement which will, with limited exceptions, require disputes between us to be submitted to binding and final arbitration.
(1) You will only be permitted to pursue disputes or claims and seek relief against us on an individual basis, not as a plaintiff or class member in any class or representative action or proceeding; and (2) you are waiving your right to pursue disputes or claims and seek relief in a court of law and to have a jury trial.
terms_of_service_page.s1_1_text: 1.1 Create an Account. In order to use certain features of the Site, you may need to register for an account (“Account”) and provide certain information about yourself as prompted by the account registration form. If you register for an Account, you represent and warrant that: (a) all required registration/account setup information you submit is truthful and accurate; (b) you will maintain the accuracy of such information. You may delete your Account at any time, for any reason, by following the instructions on the Site. Pets Clan may suspend or terminate your Account in accordance with Section 11.
terms_of_service_page.s1_2_text: 1.2 Account Responsibilities. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Account login information and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your Account. You agree to immediately notify Pets Clan of any unauthorized use, or suspected unauthorized use of your Account or any other breach of security. Pets Clan cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with the above requirements.
terms_of_service_page.s1_3_text: 1.3 Purchases. When you purchase products or services through the site, whether through an account or as a guest (no account), you agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information for all purchases made at or through our store. If you have an account, you agree to promptly update your account and other information, including your email address and credit card numbers and expiration dates, so that we can complete your transactions and contact you as needed.
terms_of_service_page.s1_4_text: 1.4 Personal Information. Personal information submitted by you through the Site is governed by our Privacy Policy. Our Privacy Policy may be viewed at https://petsclan.com and is incorporated into these Terms.

privacy_policy_page.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy_policy_page.intro: Pets Clan is committed to protecting your privacy and is constantly working to give you a safe online experience. This "Privacy Policy" applies to Pets Clan and governs its data collection and usage. Please read our Privacy Policy for more information.
privacy_policy_page.def_a: A. "Data" includes both Non-Personal Information and Personally Identifiable Information.
privacy_policy_page.def_b: B. "Non-Personal Information" is any information that is not Personally Identifiable Information (defined below). Non-Personal Information includes, without limitation, Personally Identifiable Information that has been anonymized.
privacy_policy_page.def_c: C. "Personal Information," "Personally Identifiable Information," "PII," or "Personal Data" will have the meaning set forth in the applicable data privacy and security laws for the jurisdiction you are located in. In general, Personal Data is non-public information we receive from your use of the Site that can be used, alone or in combination with other information in our possession, to identify a particular person/individual. It may include information such as name, address, telephone number, health and medical related information, and other personal information you provide us. Examples of Personal Data, include, but are not limited to: first and last name, street address, email address, telephone number, social security number, IP addresses, and healthcare related information.
privacy_policy_page.def_d: D. "Pets Clan," "we," "us" and "our" refers to the Pets Clan
privacy_policy_page.def_e: E. "Site" refers to Pets Clan's website at www.petsclan.com and other related blogs, domains, mobile sites, online services, and applications maintained by Pets Clan.
privacy_policy_page.def_f: F. "You" and "your" mean the individual or entity visiting or using the Site.
privacy_policy_page.section_2_para: You do not have to provide any Personally Identifiable Information to browse the publicly available pages of the Site; however, in order to obtain or use products or services that are or may be provided through the Site or that we may otherwise offer online or offline (collectively, the “Services”) you may be required to register and/or provide Personally Identifiable Information.
privacy_policy_page.subsection_a_title: A. Personal Data You Provide Us
privacy_policy_page.subsection_a_para: We may collect Personal Data from you in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, when you (i) use our platform based Services; (ii) fill out forms or fields on the Site or offline; (iii) complete an application for a product or service available through the Site; (iv) communicate with us through the Site or by email, mail, text, telephone, facsimile or other electronic means; (v) process payments; (vi) make payments; (vii) provide us with Personal Data; (viii) participate in activities or utilize resources provided by or through Pets Clan; or (ix) submit or authorize the submission by third parties to submit information through the Site or the Services. We collect or may collect, among other Personal Data you provide to us, the following categories of Personal Data from you:

shipping_policy_page.title: SHIPPING POLICY
shipping_policy_page.p1: All orders will be shipped within five (5) business days of receipt of the order, Monday through Friday, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. local time. Orders placed on Friday between 4 p.m. and 5 p.m. (local time) will be processed the following week. We use the United States Postal Service and FedEx to ship orders. If a tracking number is provided by the shipping carrier, we will update your order with the tracking information.
shipping_policy_page.p2: Shipping charges for your order will be calculated and displayed at checkout based on the weight of the items ordered and the delivery location. If an item is out of stock, we will ship it in installments once it becomes available. There is no additional shipping charge for backordered items. All domestic U.S. orders of $39 or more will receive free shipping. * Orders under $39 will be charged a shipping fee of $5.99 (effective May 5, 2021). We offer a flat rate for international shipping, which will be calculated at checkout.
shipping_policy_page.p3: We cannot ship to the following locations: Alaska, Guam, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands, Armed Forces Americas, Armed Forces Europe, and Armed Forces Pacific.
shipping_policy_page.notice: * Please note, we are unable to ship to addresses that contain a PO Box number.
shipping_policy_page.signature_p1: At Pets Clan, we always prioritize the safety and satisfaction of our customers. To enhance delivery security, we offer a signature service for all products in the automated cat litter box series and the PETKIT AIRSALON Air Salon series.This ensures that your merchandise is safely received upon delivery. If no special instructions are provided at checkout, all eligible products will default to this signature service.
shipping_policy_page.signature_p2: If you do not wish to use the signature service, you can inform us in advance by leaving a message, and we will update your order accordingly.
shipping_policy_page.important_notice_p1: If you choose not to accept the signature service, Pets Clan will not be liable for any claims arising from the carrier confirming successful delivery to the designated address but the recipient reporting that they have not received the goods. In such cases, the customer will need to contact the carrier directly to resolve the issue. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation in helping us ensure a safe and reliable delivery experience.
